Tool

NameCreate Database
ID35
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2015

Description

Creates a new PostgreSQL Database.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Options
HostTextPG_HOSTPasswordDefault: localhost
PortIntegerPG_PORTMinimum: 0 Default: 5432
DatabaseTextPG_NAMEDatabase NameDefault: geo_test
UserTextPG_USERUser NameDefault: postgres
PasswordTextPG_PWDPasswordDefault: postgres
